question: You play a team sport with some friends. Last week a member of the team had an accident and wasn’t able to play with you at the weekend. You decide to write to him in hospital, telling him about the match.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter,tell him which team wondescribe the conditions on the daysay how you felt about the match
text: I hope this letter finds you in good health as I am writing to you to tell you more about our previous game last Thursday.

First, as you know we played against the red team and they were very strong and well trained.We missed you because you are our twelve players.Furthermore, we won the game with a score of 3 to 2 and that was our surprise for you and we all wished you were with us.

Second, the weather was warm and all the arrangements went well, except for the parking.It was crowded because we did not expect the huge number of audience, but everything was under control.Moreover, the red team players were aggressive at the beginning, then they started being more friendly.
Third, I was happy playing this match, however, I did not feel this at the start because you were not with us.Also, all of us were doing our best to win so you can be happy and excited.
Finally, I wish you will get well soon and we are waiting for you to play the next match.

error_list.error_des: It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
It seems that quantifier use may be incorrect here.
The adjective happy is modifying playing instead of a noun or pronoun. Use an adverb to modify a verb, adjective, or other adverb.
